long_description: we connect the dots between brands and talent. powerful talent campaigns for brands that want to excite, not just exist. we are a talent agency for brands. born from the entertainment industry. built for the creator economy. we're here to help you swim in the culture, build fame, decentralise your voice, and connect with people. get more with talent. an award-winning partnership between the most-watched tv show on us cable television and one of the world's largest mobile strategy games. we help brands swim in the culture, build fame, decentralise their voice, and connect with people. identifying the right talent for brands is part art , part science. our expertise spans talent procurement for global campaigns and partnerships - through to creator and influencer activations on social, designer collaborations, talent representation, and much more. with over a decade of experience, we understand how to match the ambition, subtleties and nuances that are unique to your brand. we use this information to help you seamlessly navigate toward the talent that will deliver extraordinary results.
business_tags: mobile strategy | talent agency | pr agency | independent agency | industrial moving
generated_description: unsigned group is a talent, creative communications, and brand development agency based in the uk. with over 25 years of experience in the talent and entertainment industries, they specialize in managing high-end talent, implementing effective communication strategies, and developing market-leading brands. they connect the dots between brands and talent to create powerful talent campaigns for brands that want to excite, not just exist. as an independent agency, their only agenda is to create work that commands attention and delivers meaningful results for their clients. they have won awards for their partnership between a popular tv show and a mobile strategy game.
